snippet: BermanBraun, a fast-growing digital media/television/movie company, has chosen Jeff Berman, a respected executive at the National Football League, to become the entertainment company's first president.
abstract: BermanBraun, a fast-growing digital media/television/movie company, has chosen Jeff Berman, a respected executive at the National Football League, to become the entertainment company's first president.

headline.main: Media Company Taps N.F.L. Executive as President
